GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_hid: fix f_hidg lifetime vs cdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 1b6a53e447ec3d81623610c8c7ec5082b47dfdce, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit 71adf118946957839a13aa4d1094183e05c6c094. For more details please see the references link.
